subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hisanori Takahashi faced the Yankees with the Yomiuri Giants in a 2004 exhibition game in Tokyo, but few of those players will be in the lineup Friday for the Subway Series.
snippet: Hisanori Takahashi faced the Yankees with the Yomiuri Giants in a 2004 exhibition game in Tokyo, but few of those players will be in the lineup Friday for the Subway Series.
